name: The Discovery of Fire
description: A celebration of mankind and Fire - our most enduring ally.  Its discovery was the most important moment in our species' history.  Together, we would spread to every corner of the planet.  Fire carried mankind through every desert, ice age, and mountain range, and man spread fire throughout the world to places it had never seen.  Fire was the gateway drug that spurred a technological revolution.  From stone tools to satellites - fire started it all.
